loaderInputPlaceholder: Search for movies and TV shows...
serviceSectionText: Cine-Zenith isn't just a library; it's your personal guide to the universe of cinema. We leverage powerful data to bring you a clean, fast, and modern discovery experience.
serviceSectionCardTextOne: Explore the weekly trending movies and TV shows before anyone else.
serviceSectionCardTextTwo: Find critically acclaimed masterpieces and the highest-rated titles of all time.
serviceSectionCardTextThree: Get the latest list of movies and series that are currently "On the Air."
serviceSectionTMDbCardText: Our entire library is powered by the TMDb API, providing real-time data.
serviceSectionCtaText: Learn more about the project, the technology stack, and the developer.
homePageSearchSectionText: Explore our entire database. Search for any movie or TV show.
